Reviews.Title: good choice
Reviews.Author: Hope Targoff
Reviews.Content: I have always had Kodak digital cameras due to the ease of use.  I recently spread my wings and bought the Samsung PL120 and love it.  It takes some time getting used to all the features and I sometimes forget how to get back to a setting in time for a great picture but all in all I am very satisfied with the camera. It takes excellent pictures with lots of cool settings.  The only thing it does not have that I liked on my other cameras is a panoramic stitching.  I like taking wide scenery pictures.  Instead I opted for the self portrait front screen and love it!  I bought it on Amazon with a package deal and it was a great price.

Reviews.Title: Best Little Camera out there!!!
Reviews.Author: Ray-Ray
Reviews.Content: I'm a fan of Nikon cameras.  After I dropped it, it broke.  Was at a store checking it out another customer customer (a professional photographer whispered and said) I would be pleased with the Samsung "hands-down".  I purchased the Samsung camera and I love it.  Clearest picture out there for the category (price, etc.).  Takes realistic pictures, without too light effect.  Also the videos you take, looks like HD.  Very clear and the sound is wonderful.  The case is nice too, not cheap looking.  It is so small and light, I carry it most of the time.  The bundle is perfect for the price.  Summary:  if you're looking for a small (not too expensive) camera with great pictures, this one is it.  Oh, one more thing, I was hesitant with the re-chargeable battery, but I'm very happy with that.  At first, after the 1st charge, it ran down after about 50 pictures, but on the second charge, it is still strong at 100% after 78 pictures.  Also a great feature is that after snapping a picture, it recovers within about 2 seconds for the next picture.  My old (Nikon) camera took about 7-8 seconds, which means you're losing shots while waiting.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and great Deal
Reviews.Author: Anne Lehman
Reviews.Content: My son ordered this camera to replace an earlier Samsung camera.  He has taken great video as well as photos.  The viewing screen on the front is a fun bonus.  This deal with the tripod and other accessories is a great package.  He really loves the camera and Samsung has performed very well for us in the past.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and kit
Reviews.Author: Richard Torres Perez
Reviews.Content: It is a good offer from this seller, but it is a shame that there is any left by now, because I wanted to purchase one extra. So if they will have more in stock I will definitely buy once again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Giselle
Reviews.Content: I love Samsung products and this camera deepened that affection. The package included a mini tripod, memory card, memory card reader, lens cleaner, camera bag and of course the dual view camera. All of that for $114! That's a great deal! The camera works great. The photos are incredible. The video quality is on point. My last Samsung camera needed batteries often but this one comes with a rechargeable battery! My old camera works fine, so I know Samsung products are durable. I bought this one especially for the dual screen. This makes life easier.  The Camera arrived on time as well. Great product. Great service! Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: not quite as good as I had expected
Reviews.Author: sfl612
Reviews.Content: the camera tends to have a blurrier picture than w/ my old digital...I know this is do to shakiness when I depress the shutter button...but my old camera didn't seem to have this problem.  what I do love about this is the front display...and it does come w/ quite a bit of paraphernalia...tripod, case, cleaning kit, etc.  over all a good camera for the money

Reviews.Title: Camera.. well, it's "okay" and the shipping/service was excellent!
Reviews.Author: BrittanyFawn
Reviews.Content: This seller and the service was amazing. It came fast and with everything, but the 8g card, However, I emailed them, and it was sent within the week. very prompt. The camera it's self is small and light and I especially like the front view on the camera. Lots of features, but the quality doesn't always turn out the best. But it's a good starter camera, not for those looking for a "better" camera.

Reviews.Title: Light weight and Really good camera
Reviews.Author: A. Brown "GoodNews"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. Video in 1080P. Picture quality is beautify and plus the front view LCD. Nicely put together.

Reviews.Title: Neat little camera but !
Reviews.Author: M. Walters "Always learning Susieq"
Reviews.Content: Took Christmas pictures and most come out very good, camera light weight and all accessories so far have worked great.  Haven't used as much as I would like to give a complete and fair assessment of this camera.The only complaint so far.  A small book explaining all features and HOW TO was not included and SHOULD BE.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan C.
Reviews.Content: I love this bundle deal, and it comes with everything you need! Great quality photos, and easy to use.You can take great self portraits tanks to the front viewfinder, also it's rechargeable, if you were wondering as i was. Great product overall!

Reviews.Title: Muy contento con el producto!!
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis Perez
Reviews.Content: Honestly very happy with the product, the description is correct, arrived on time, excellent product quality, congratulations and I recommend this product to the seller Beach Camera, I give 5 stars thanks.Jose Luis PerezVenezuela

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Trini Girl
Reviews.Content: This camera is nice and with the accessories its a best deal for the price.  One down fall tho, is the video taping. The image is slower than the sound which is pretty annoying but overall its a lovely slim and cute camera. Lovvvvee the accessories.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the solo traveler
Reviews.Author: J. Tuiasosopo
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! Just got back from Puerto Rico by myself and when people saw the screen on the front they loved it too. It takes good pictures although there were a couple of times it was fuzzy so I just retook the picture no biggie and carried on. I love love love this camera and the fact that it came in this bundle is great!

Reviews.Title: Good Service
Reviews.Author: CO10
Reviews.Content: Excellent service and arrive on time. Good camera and the price was excellent. Just what I was looking for.The bonus items make this a bargain. I am very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Darwin Condoy
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, has an acceptable quality, in addition to being made ​​from raw material first and be very durableCongratulations to you

Reviews.Title: Have had a chance to use it and love it.
Reviews.Author: Paul W. Brown
Reviews.Content: Do not use it a lot, but have had no problems taking pictures, downloading them to the computer, and sending them as attachments. I have no recent experience with cameras, much less digital cameras. All I can say is it seems to be a good basic camera at a fair price.

Reviews.Title: Lots of accessories
Reviews.Author: J M.
Reviews.Content: Clear pics, nice design.  I love this little wonder.  small enough to fit in your pocket or change purse.  I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Samsung customer Service
Reviews.Author: JH
Reviews.Content: I was pretty pleased with this purchase initially. Took maybe 100 pictures with it. Left it at home when I deployed. Upon return to the states picked it up for the family vacation and started taking pictures. The zoom lens became stuck in the out position with error message stating that the zoom lens was malfunctioning. "DUH". I was directed by the Amazon vendor to contact Samsung directly as it had been to long between the time that I had bought the camera and when it started its "glitch". So I called the Samsung service center as directed. Guess what??? I am 2 months beyond the warranty and need to pay another $50 to get it looked at. So I basically have a $200 camera. All things considered, This package may seem like a good deal, but if Samsung will not back there product up, why bother. Just get a $200 plus camera and cut to the chase. Not a Samsung fan. By the way, just to be fair, Beach Camera was very quick to respond and even wrote me back on weekends to help get me to Samsung's doorstep.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Joyce L. Vaughan "Joyfulhope"
Reviews.Content: If I were going to choose a camera for a beginner, this would be it.  It's got some fun options and it's very stylish.  I prefer something a littler bigger, but this is great for carrying around in my purse.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Wilman
Reviews.Content: Complete camera and combo came with everything fully complements the functionality of it. very practical and easy to carry light everywhere and very simple operation that helps make quality shots

Reviews.Title: Anderson castillo
Reviews.Author: ANDERSON CASTILLO
Reviews.Content: fue un regalo para mi esposa  esta contenta excelente producto de calidad lo recomiendo cunple con todas las  especificaciones gracias

Reviews.Title: WOW WOW
Reviews.Author: Winsome Bullock-Jack
Reviews.Content: This is a very unique camera, size appropriate, takes excellent photographs.  This was a envy of my friends, it now gifted to a family member who loved it so much.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: M. Russell
Reviews.Content: My favourite part about this camera is the front LCD that lets you take self shots. It's light weight so easy to carry around. I find the picture quality it also very good. I am happy with this product

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Diana Lorena Delgado
Reviews.Content: Samsung Multiview MV800 14.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black) Bundle Includes 8 GB Memory Card, Card Reader, Deluxe Carrying Case, Mini Tripod, and 3Pcs. Lens Cleaning Kit.. the complete kit and the camera arrived on time, really nice!! easy to use, i recommend it.

Reviews.Title: XMAS Present for Mom
Reviews.Author: Ashley Patterson
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a xmas present for my mom last year and she loved it. It was a great bundle and reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Jennd
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. It is simple to use and the picture quality is good. Good product for a good price.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Carlos Jesus Cruz
Reviews.Content: I am glad I made this purchase. It is one of the best deals that I have made in my entire life! ( I bought it for about 119 bucks then). Though the case was different than that showed, it fits well. The mini tripod is sturdy and the 8gb memory is even more than I need. Overall 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Fabian "2bxact"
Reviews.Content: I was surprise that the camera even worked as well as it did. It is a fabulous gift option, since that was the idea behind the purchase. The pouch wasn't the soft textured type but was effective. The other accessories were as described. All worked fine.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Dual-Screen Camera
Reviews.Author: lenny guevara
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice camera. I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend for her birthday and she really liked it.Somebody should have thought of this earlier because the front screen eliminates the annoyance of having to use the iconic bathroom mirror to take pictures. Also, girls can actually look at themselves while making their "duckface" pose while they take the picture.Pros:Dual-screenOption for little kids (clown face, smiley face)16.1 MP (really nice)Multiple different filtersNice little tripod for on the go shots8 GB memory card (lots of space)Cons:Could have more features when editing the picturesSamsung still is using their own charging cable, rather than the universal implementation of the micro-usbOverall, nifty camera, user friendly for the most part. 5/5

Reviews.Title: For my wife
Reviews.Author: TonyT408
Reviews.Content: it was a replacement for her TL225 , so the camera lens is not as great as that. however the quality in my opinion is great. we have recorded HD videos but have not processed them on dvd , so i have not seen the actual HD Video on TV. The pictures are amazing you get from the wide angle lens, also with options for different size pictures. the additional bundle items are amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Deana
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera.  The bundle pack is a great deal.  Takes great photos.  No issues with blurry pics or anything like that.  Its a great deal.

Reviews.Title: samsung MV800
Reviews.Author: carito pinzon
Reviews.Content: is a nice camera!! nice!!!!!! but I am still waiting the micro sd memory... the camera take very nice pictures!!!  and videos!!! and the tripod is very nice too!!! I really love this camera!! you can take pictures to yourself using the front lcd screen... awesome....

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: nic03tony
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 11 year old daughter. She is taking photography for 4H and needed a camera. I just love this combo, it was perfect and it takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good buy no Memory...
Reviews.Author: Hernan Arguello
Reviews.Content: I went to buy it in Best Buy and Walmart, none of them had this camera. I was looking for it because it has the option to see the picture with the frontal display. In Best Buy they even said that it was a discontinued item... would have gotten 5 stars but the morons don't include the MEMORY :/

Reviews.Title: bought as a gift
Reviews.Author: Gift
Reviews.Content: purchase this camera for a cousin and so far I haven't heard any complaints. It arrived on time.. So the service and product are both great.

Reviews.Title: Right, Not as good as I expected! BLUR IMAGES!!
Reviews.Author: Alek Modi "Magic"
Reviews.Content: Samsung PL120 Camera and accessories, both are pretty good although I have had some blur images issue. First I thought its coz of my hands but even after using the "tripod" it captures blur images.. It is because of the time taken for "processing" the image in camera. I have to keep the camera steady for 2-3 seconds to get a clear picture which is annoying and little bit disappointing. 3 on 5 (o.O)

Reviews.Title: money wise
Reviews.Author: 1st-shot
Reviews.Content: Came on time. The front lcd is optional not pop always whenever you take pics. Difficult to find the timer for self shot.nice though. So far,for the price and performance i like it.

Reviews.Title: great deal =I think
Reviews.Author: M. S. Schulman "hedonist"
Reviews.Content: I am new to computers and digital cameras.This piece of work has done every thing I wanted in a camera. I am still learning it's intricasies but thats because I'm quasi computer illiterate.I LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: i absolutely love this camera! it came right on time and in perfect condition. i bought this to replace my old sony camera that my sister broke. it takes perfect pictures and the video is super clear. i would definitly recommend this to a friend. :)

Reviews.Title: Samsung Dualview Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: vettekgirl
Reviews.Content: My daughter loved it!!! She says it is the best camera she has ever had!  I bought this camera for her for Christmas and she has enjoyed it so much. The pictures are very clear and  the ease of use is great. Downloading to a computer is a snap. Would highly recommend this camera to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: RY
Reviews.Content: Excelente camara hasta ahora. gran calidad de imagen, buena duracion de bateria e imagen en pantalla del lcd muy clara, la pantalla frontal es muy util asi como el modo para ninos.

Reviews.Title: good price
Reviews.Author: jayuco
Reviews.Content: good pics, a little grain in them.the jump action only works well out doors with a good lightit was a perfect gift for mi girlfriend

Reviews.Title: samsung pl120
Reviews.Author: diamond
Reviews.Content: This camera is great!!!! My fiance loves his camera. It was his valentines day gift. The service was great from Beach Camera it was delivered on time. Everything was in the box unopened and all the extras made this a great gift idea. With nothing more to purchase i give this product and company five stars!!!! I would recommond the camera and company to anyone!!!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
Reviews.Author: Ja-Ja
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE this camera; fits all my needs, takes great pictures, resonable priced and best of all ...... no batteries (just a charger)

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Ariel Orozco Rivera
Reviews.Content: Great camera!!! It came with all the extras! Have quite amount of nice effects in it, and the front camera is pretty useful!! A must have option for those of you who are looking for an unexpensive camera with nice features!

Reviews.Title: pretty good for the price
Reviews.Author: pm67
Reviews.Content: Came with a lot of items to go with camera. One of the packaging on one item was ripped, I wouldnt have care if it was for me, but it was a gift for my boyfriend. Other than that i love what I bought. Camera works well and the whole deal is great. I would recommend this for a beginner.

Reviews.Title: Calificación
Reviews.Author: Kitas
Reviews.Content: Excelente equipo! Duradero y entretenido, mi familia lo disfrutará muchísimo! Feliz de haber realizado esta compra. Lo recomiendo totalmente. Saludos

ProductInfo.Features:
14MP Dualview Black Digital Camera.
Dual LCDs, 5x Wide-Angle Zoom Lens
HD Video, Image Stabilization.
Bundle Includes 8 GB Memory Card,Card Reader, Deluxe Carrying Case
Also includes Mini Tripod, and 3Pcs. Lens Cleaning Kit.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Multiview MV800 14.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black) Bundle Includes 8 GB Memory Card, Card Reader, Deluxe Carrying Case, Mini Tripod, and 3Pcs. Lens Cleaning Kit
